page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT
page.content: When you leave school the most difficult thing is getting a job today because of the country's {unemployment problem.} Some of the people who are lucky enough to get jobs are usually paid the average sum of roughly Â£25 per day, but those unemployed are on the{dole}and get less. If you do not get enough money from your job there is{Social {Security.} The main employment is {farming and forestry.}In the villages here there are jobs like shopkeeping, building, taxi driving bed & breakfast work. People go out of the area to work to Bodmin, people like teachers, lawyers,shop keepers and hospital workers. When I leave home I hope to be a policeman. I don't particulary want to leave the area but I will if I have to.
